@devlicious. A lot of Dutch films these days get at least English subtitles if not more languages. Even if This one doesn't have them yet it can't hurt to ask (or perhaps look for them himself but that's a different story). At least don't go around calling people dumbasses for a very reasonable question.

That said, thanks for the upload though imo it was the usual overly dramatic and misplaced shit as most Dutch "historical" films of the last decade. Shame, a damn shame.
